description: Ryuuzaki Sakuno is the granddaughter of http://anidb.net/ch7212 [Sumire], and the first person in Japan who has direct contact with http://anidb.net/ch7198 [Ryoma] Echizen. She is a kind, nice and quiet girl with very long hair kept in twin braids, who almost always seems to worry about Ryoma and the others. She starts playing tennis after watching Ryoma. She often hangs around and supports the Seigaku team, though she particularly admires Ryoma.
name: Ryuuzaki Sakuno
